}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [http://www.pcmag.com/article/print/5079 Kingston Delivers Cable-Free Connectivity] :Small review from 2001 about this and the [[Kingston KNW-USB11]]
The drivers specify multiple USB IDs for this device.. *07cc:000a (in WLANMON.INF) **'''<small>WLAN USB Firmware Loader</small>''' *07cc:000b (in WLANUSB.INF) **'''<small>Kingston EtheRx KNW-USB11 Wireless LAN USB Adapter</small>'''
This device is meant to be used with the [[Kingston KNW-PCM11]]. As such the FCC ID of the wireless module and the OEM product has been assigned to it.
The same Z-Com product was also (and perhaps only) released as the [[Planex GW-US110]].
==Pictures== <center><gallery caption="from the PC Magazine review"> File:Kingston EtheRx PCMCIA and USB.jpg </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]]
